name: valueset-deworming-record
title: EmCare.B17.DE16
description: Can record of Deworming treatment be obtained at a future visit?

concept.display: Yes, Date documented, but not here

designation.value: The caregiver is able to provide the deworming treatment date, but not Today

concept.display: No, but last dose given less than 1 month ago

designation.value: The caregiver is able to tell the healthcare worker that the last dose was given less than 1 month ago

concept.display: No, but last dose given between 1 and 6 months ago

designation.value: The caregiver is able to tell the healthcare worker that the last dose was given between 1 and 6 months ago

concept.display: No, but last dose given more than 6 months ago

designation.value: The caregiver is able to tell the healthcare worker that the last dose was given more than 6 months ago

concept.display: No, Do not know when last dose was given

designation.value: The caregiver is not able to tell the healthcare worker when the last dose was given
